example.text: Recent actions by [[user]] have created concerns for thousands of #GBTC investors. Today I called for the [[user]]'s attention to this matter and to help honor our commitment towards #InvestorProtection. [[url]]

The movement to end incitement in #Palestinian education is growing. I'm proud to reintroduce my legislation, the Peace & Tolerance in Palestinian Education Act. The EU Parliament just passed a resolution to condemn hateful content in PA curriculum. 1/3 [[url]]
